Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Yellowjackets

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: Renfield

Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane

Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: The Menu

Synopsis: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

Title: Yellowjackets
Cast: Stars:, Melanie Lynskey, , Tawny Cypress, , Sophie Nélisse, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: The Boogeyman
Cast: Director:, Rob Savage, | ,     Stars:, Sophie Thatcher, , Chris Messina, , Vivien Lyra Blair, , David Dastmalchian
Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Title: The Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Andrew Lincoln, , Norman Reedus, , Melissa McBride, , Lauren Cohan
Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: Evil Dead Rise
Cast: Director:, Lee Cronin, | ,     Stars:, Mirabai Pease, , Richard Crouchley, , Anna-Maree Thomas, , Lily Sullivan
Synopsis: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival as they face the most nightmarish version of family imaginable.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: X
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , Jenna Ortega, , Brittany Snow, , Kid Cudi
Synopsis: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: Old
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Gael García Bernal, , Vicky Krieps, , Rufus Sewell, , Alex Wolff
Synopsis: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: Scream VI
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Courteney Cox, , Melissa Barrera, , Jenna Ortega, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: The Pope's Exorcist
Cast: Director:, Julius Avery, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Daniel Zovatto, , Alex Essoe, , Franco Nero
Synopsis: Follow Gabriele Amorth, the Vatican's leading exorcist, as he investigates the possession of a child and uncovers a conspiracy the Vatican has tried to keep secret.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: The Menu
Cast: Director:, Mark Mylod, | ,     Stars:, Ralph Fiennes, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Nicholas Hoult, , Hong Chau
Synopsis: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

Title: Malum
Cast: Director:, Anthony DiBlasi, | ,     Stars:, Jessica Sula, , Natalie Victoria, , Sam Brooks, , Candice Coke
Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , David Corenswet, , Tandi Wright, , Matthew Sunderland
Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Title: Nefarious
Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters
Synopsis: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Midsommar
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Florence Pugh, , Jack Reynor, , Vilhelm Blomgren, , William Jackson Harper
Synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Knock at the Cabin
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird
Synopsis: While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.

Title: Nope
Cast: Director:, Jordan Peele, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Kaluuya, , Keke Palmer, , Brandon Perea, , Michael Wincott
Synopsis: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: American Psycho
Cast: Director:, Mary Harron, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Justin Theroux, , Josh Lucas, , Bill Sage
Synopsis: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Smile
Cast: Director:, Parker Finn, | ,     Stars:, Sosie Bacon, , Jessie T. Usher, , Kyle Gallner, , Robin Weigert
Synopsis: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.

Synopsis: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival as they face the most nightmarish version of family imaginable.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: X
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , Jenna Ortega, , Brittany Snow, , Kid Cudi
Synopsis: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: Old
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Gael García Bernal, , Vicky Krieps, , Rufus Sewell, , Alex Wolff
Synopsis: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: Scream VI
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Courteney Cox, , Melissa Barrera, , Jenna Ortega, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: The Pope's Exorcist
Cast: Director:, Julius Avery, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Daniel Zovatto, , Alex Essoe, , Franco Nero
Synopsis: Follow Gabriele Amorth, the Vatican's leading exorcist, as he investigates the possession of a child and uncovers a conspiracy the Vatican has tried to keep secret.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: The Menu
Cast: Director:, Mark Mylod, | ,     Stars:, Ralph Fiennes, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Nicholas Hoult, , Hong Chau
Synopsis: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

Title: Malum
Cast: Director:, Anthony DiBlasi, | ,     Stars:, Jessica Sula, , Natalie Victoria, , Sam Brooks, , Candice Coke
Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , David Corenswet, , Tandi Wright, , Matthew Sunderland
Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Title: Nefarious
Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters
Synopsis: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Midsommar
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Florence Pugh, , Jack Reynor, , Vilhelm Blomgren, , William Jackson Harper
Synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Knock at the Cabin
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird
Synopsis: While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.

Title: Nope
Cast: Director:, Jordan Peele, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Kaluuya, , Keke Palmer, , Brandon Perea, , Michael Wincott
Synopsis: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: American Psycho
Cast: Director:, Mary Harron, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Justin Theroux, , Josh Lucas, , Bill Sage
Synopsis: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Smile
Cast: Director:, Parker Finn, | ,     Stars:, Sosie Bacon, , Jessie T. Usher, , Kyle Gallner, , Robin Weigert
Synopsis: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.

Title: M3GAN
Cast: Director:, Gerard Johnstone, | ,     Stars:, Allison Williams, , Violet McGraw, , Ronny Chieng, , Amie Donald

Title: Scream
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Neve Campbell, , Courteney Cox, , David Arquette, , Melissa Barrera

Cast: Director:, Damien Leone, | ,     Stars:, Lauren LaVera, , David Howard Thornton, , Elliott Fullam, , Sarah Voigt

Title: The Sandman

Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: X
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , Jenna Ortega, , Brittany Snow, , Kid Cudi
Synopsis: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: Old
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Gael García Bernal, , Vicky Krieps, , Rufus Sewell, , Alex Wolff
Synopsis: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: Attack on Titan
Cast: Stars:, Josh Grelle, , Bryce Papenbrook, , Yûki Kaji, , Yui Ishikawa
Synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: Scream VI
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Courteney Cox, , Melissa Barrera, , Jenna Ortega, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: The Pope's Exorcist
Cast: Director:, Julius Avery, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Daniel Zovatto, , Alex Essoe, , Franco Nero
Synopsis: Follow Gabriele Amorth, the Vatican's leading exorcist, as he investigates the possession of a child and uncovers a conspiracy the Vatican has tried to keep secret.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: The Menu
Cast: Director:, Mark Mylod, | ,     Stars:, Ralph Fiennes, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Nicholas Hoult, , Hong Chau
Synopsis: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

Title: Malum
Cast: Director:, Anthony DiBlasi, | ,     Stars:, Jessica Sula, , Natalie Victoria, , Sam Brooks, , Candice Coke
Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , David Corenswet, , Tandi Wright, , Matthew Sunderland
Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Title: Nefarious
Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters
Synopsis: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Midsommar
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Florence Pugh, , Jack Reynor, , Vilhelm Blomgren, , William Jackson Harper
Synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: Bhediya
Cast: Director:, Amar Kaushik, | ,     Stars:, Varun Dhawan, , Kriti Sanon, , Abhishek Banerjee, , Deepak Dobriyal
Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Knock at the Cabin
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird
Synopsis: While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.

Title: Nope
Cast: Director:, Jordan Peele, | ,     Stars:, Daniel Kaluuya, , Keke Palmer, , Brandon Perea, , Michael Wincott
Synopsis: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: American Psycho
Cast: Director:, Mary Harron, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Justin Theroux, , Josh Lucas, , Bill Sage
Synopsis: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Smile
Cast: Director:, Parker Finn, | ,     Stars:, Sosie Bacon, , Jessie T. Usher, , Kyle Gallner, , Robin Weigert
Synopsis: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.

Title: M3GAN
Cast: Director:, Gerard Johnstone, | ,     Stars:, Allison Williams, , Violet McGraw, , Ronny Chieng, , Amie Donald
Synopsis: A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.

Title: Scream
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Neve Campbell, , Courteney Cox, , David Arquette, , Melissa Barrera
Synopsis: 25 years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, Calif., a new killer dons the Ghostface mask and begins targeting a group of teenagers to resurrect secrets from the town's deadly past.

Title: Terrifier 2
Cast: Director:, Damien Leone, | ,     Stars:, Lauren LaVera, , David Howard Thornton, , Elliott Fullam, , Sarah Voigt
Synopsis: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

Title: Inside No. 9
Cast: Stars:, Reece Shearsmith, , Steve Pemberton, , Derek Jacobi, , Aimee-Ffion Edwards
Synopsis: Genre-mixing anthology series, inviting viewers into some very different and enigmatic No. 9s.

Title: Barbarian
Cast: Director:, Zach Cregger, | ,     Stars:, Georgina Campbell, , Bill Skarsgård, , Justin Long, , Matthew Patrick Davis
Synopsis: A woman staying at an Airbnb discovers that the house she has rented is not what it seems.

Title: The Sandman
Cast: Stars:, Tom Sturridge, , Boyd Holbrook, , Patton Oswalt, , Vivienne Acheampong
Synopsis: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

Title: It
Cast: Director:, Andy Muschietti, | ,     Stars:, Bill Skarsgård, , Jaeden Martell, , Finn Wolfhard, , Sophia Lillis
Synopsis: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

Title: Infinity Pool
Cast: Director:, Brandon Cronenberg, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Skarsgård, , Mia Goth, , Cleopatra Coleman, , Dunja Sepcic
Synopsis: James and Em Foster are enjoying an all-inclusive beach vacation in the fictional island of La Tolqa, when a fatal accident exposes the resort's perverse subculture of hedonistic tourism, reckless violence and surreal horrors.

Title: Hereditary
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Toni Collette, , Milly Shapiro, , Gabriel Byrne, , Alex Wolff
Synopsis: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

Title: Love, Death & Robots
Cast: Stars:, Fred Tatasciore, , Scott Whyte, , Nolan North, , Noshir Dalal
Synopsis: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

Title: Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey
Cast: Director:, Rhys Frake-Waterfield, | ,     Stars:, Nikolai Leon, , Maria Taylor, , Natasha Rose Mills, , Amber Doig-Thorne
Synopsis: After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.

Title: Hannibal
Cast: Stars:, Hugh Dancy, , Mads Mikkelsen, , Caroline Dhavernas, , Laurence Fishburne
Synopsis: Explores the early relationship between renowned psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter and a young FBI criminal profiler who is haunted by his ability to empathize with serial killers.

Title: Alien
Cast: Director:, Ridley Scott, | ,     Stars:, Sigourney Weaver, , Tom Skerritt, , John Hurt, , Veronica Cartwright
Synopsis: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Title: Tusk
Cast: Director:, Kevin Smith, | ,     Stars:, Justin Long, , Michael Parks, , Haley Joel Osment, , Genesis Rodriguez
Synopsis: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Title: Scream
Cast: Director:, Wes Craven, | ,     Stars:, Neve Campbell, , Courteney Cox, , David Arquette, , Skeet Ulrich
Synopsis: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

Title: Evil Dead
Cast: Director:, Fede Alvarez, | ,     Stars:, Jane Levy, , Shiloh Fernandez, , Jessica Lucas, , Lou Taylor Pucci
Synopsis: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

Title: Yellowjackets
Cast: Stars:, Melanie Lynskey, , Tawny Cypress, , Sophie Nélisse, , Jasmin Savoy Brown

Title: From

Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: The Boogeyman

Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane

Title: The Pope's Exorcist
Cast: Director:, Julius Avery, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Daniel Zovatto, , Alex Essoe, , Franco Nero
Synopsis: Follow Gabriele Amorth, the Vatican's leading exorcist, as he investigates the possession of a child and uncovers a conspiracy the Vatican has tried to keep secret.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: The Menu
Cast: Director:, Mark Mylod, | ,     Stars:, Ralph Fiennes, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Nicholas Hoult, , Hong Chau

Title: Malum
Cast: Director:, Anthony DiBlasi, | ,     Stars:, Jessica Sula, , Natalie Victoria, , Sam Brooks, , Candice Coke
Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , David Corenswet, , Tandi Wright, , Matthew Sunderland
Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Title: Nefarious
Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters
Synopsis: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Florence Pugh, , Jack Reynor, , Vilhelm Blomgren, , William Jackson Harper
Synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: Bhediya

Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird

Synopsis: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

Synopsis: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

Synopsis: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Synopsis: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl

Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters

Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird

Title: Malum
Cast: Director:, Anthony DiBlasi, | ,     Stars:, Jessica Sula, , Natalie Victoria, , Sam Brooks, , Candice Coke
Synopsis: A rookie police officer willingly takes the last shift at a newly decommissioned police station in an attempt to uncover the mysterious connection between her father's death and a vicious cult.

Title: Pearl

Synopsis: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Cast: Directors:, Chuck Konzelman, , Cary Solomon, | ,     Stars:, Sean Patrick Flanery, , Jordan Belfi, , James Healy Jr., , Robert Peters
Synopsis: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Midsommar
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Florence Pugh, , Jack Reynor, , Vilhelm Blomgren, , William Jackson Harper
Synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

Title: Bhediya

Synopsis: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: Knock at the Cabin
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Dave Bautista, , Jonathan Groff, , Ben Aldridge, , Nikki Amuka-Bird

Title: Nope

Synopsis: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: American Psycho
Cast: Director:, Mary Harron, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Justin Theroux, , Josh Lucas, , Bill Sage
Synopsis: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Smile
Cast: Director:, Parker Finn, | ,     Stars:, Sosie Bacon, , Jessie T. Usher, , Kyle Gallner, , Robin Weigert

Title: M3GAN

Title: Scream

Synopsis: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

Title: Hannibal

Synopsis: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Title: Tusk
Cast: Director:, Kevin Smith, | ,     Stars:, Justin Long, , Michael Parks, , Haley Joel Osment, , Genesis Rodriguez
Synopsis: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Title: Scream

Synopsis: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

Title: Evil Dead

Title: Yellowjackets

Title: From

Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.
